summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; authorizing execution of a Permit Agreement and an Estoppel Certificate with RAYMOND A. FEICHTMEIR for Riverview Plaza Building 2 & 3 and DANIEL G. BLUM as Trustee for the BETSY FEICHTMEIR TRUST for Riverview Plaza Building 1 to provide for vehicular and pedestrian crossings and to landscape the City's Cedar River Pipeline No. 4 right of way in a manner consistent with Riverview Plaza, an office complex.
